Let's apply `bcstats` in a few examples.

## Toy example
First, consider the following minimal working example. `bcstats` comes with two example two data sets. The following lines of code loads the library and attaches the data to your working environment.

```{r}
library(bcstats)
load(survey)
load(bc)
```
